metadata.title: Goongoom - Anonymous Q&A Platform
metadata.description: Ask anything and get honest answers

auth.loginRequired: Please log in first to send a question.
auth.welcomeDescription: Log in to send and receive anonymous questions

passkey.setupError: Something went wrong while setting up passkey. Please try again.
passkey.setupCompleteDescription: You can now log in faster and more securely.
passkey.nudgeTitle: What if someone answers without permission?
passkey.nudgeDescription: Log in faster and safer with Face ID or Touch ID
passkey.fasterDescription:
One touch to log in with Face ID,
fingerprint, or device lock.

share.title: Share
share.easyShareDescription: Share your link on Instagram, Twitter, anywhere. Get questions with just one click.
share.instagramShareDescription: Save your witty answers as images and share them right to Instagram Stories and feeds.

questions.inputPlaceholder: What would you like to ask?
questions.whoToAsk: How do you want to ask?
questions.termsAgreement: By asking, you agree to our <link>terms of service</link>

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.emptyDescription: New questions will show up here.

settings.title: Settings
settings.anonymousRestrictionDescription: Limit anonymous questions to reduce unwanted messages.
settings.profileSettingsDescription: Set up your profile info and social links.
settings.accountSettingsDescription: Manage your username, phone, and security

notificationSettings.title: Notifications
notificationSettings.enableDescription: Get notified when you receive new questions.
notificationSettings.unsupported: Push notifications are not supported in this browser.
notificationSettings.blocked: Notifications are blocked. Please enable them in your browser settings.
notificationSettings.permissionDenied: Permission was denied. Please try again.
notificationSettings.permissionBlocked: Notifications are blocked in your browser settings.
notificationSettings.configError: Notification configuration error. Please try again later.
notificationSettings.subscribeError: Failed to enable notifications. Please try again.
notificationSettings.unsubscribeError: Failed to disable notifications. Please try again.

home.heroDescription:
Ask anonymously, answer honestly.
Share your profile and hear what your friends really think.
home.safeAnonymityDescription: Questioner identities stay completely anonymous. Start honest conversations without any pressure.

questionSecurity.anyoneDescription: Even non-members can send anonymous questions.
questionSecurity.verifiedLabel: Only verified users can ask anonymously
questionSecurity.verifiedDescription: Only users with verified phone numbers can send anonymous questions.
questionSecurity.invalidSetting: Please check your question security setting

restrictions.anonymousLoginRequired: Don't worry, you can still ask anonymously.
restrictions.identifiedOnly: This user only accepts identified questions.
restrictions.loginForIdentified: Log in to send questions with your name.

errors.profileLoadError: We had trouble loading your profile. Please try again.
errors.invalidSecuritySetting: Please check your question security setting
errors.profileUpdateError: We had trouble updating your profile. Please try again.
errors.recipientAndContentRequired: Please add a recipient and question content
errors.publicQuestionLoginRequired: Please log in first to send public questions
errors.publicQuestionOnly: This user only accepts public questions
errors.anonymousLoginRequired: Please log in first to send anonymous questions
errors.questionCreateFailed: We couldn't send your question. Please try again.
errors.questionCreateError: Something went wrong while sending your question
errors.questionIdAndContentRequired: Please add question ID and answer content
errors.onlyRecipientCanAnswer: Only the recipient can answer this question
errors.answerCreateFailed: We couldn't save your answer. Please try again.
errors.answerCreateError: Something went wrong while saving your answer

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: See what your friends are asking and answering
friends.emptyDescription: When your friends answer questions, they'll show up here.

a2hs.title: Add to Home Screen
a2hs.description:
Access instantly like an app
and get notifications.
